Originally from Iran then imported to Italy Siam Thailand A cat derived from the Wichian Maat (Thai cat) with a characteristic long and slender body, oval face, wide ears, and bluish eyes Siberia Rusia Russian domestic cat with thick fur and large body but very agile and famous for its jumping ability // Data anjing Bulldog Inggris A popular dog known for its chubby, muscular body, wrinkled face, and snub nose Husky Alaska,Siberia,Finland (snowy areas) A special breed of dog originally used to pull sleighs Kintamani Indonesia Dog breeds native to the island of Bali Samoyed Rusia Dogs originating from Siberia that were originally used to guard livestock by the Samoyed . tribe Shepherd Jerman Smart and strong dog, now widely used as guard dog, bodyguard, and police dog (K9) Shiba Jepang This dog from the Shiba area is agile and agile so it was originally used a lot for hunting // Data tikus Sewer rat got ears or ears that are thin but wide, their bodies are much more flexible than other types of mice that usually roam around the house, have a sharp nose and a body size that extends from the mouth to the tip of the tail roof rat roof the shape of the ears is much smaller but hairy, the roof rat`s body has a smaller size but is filled with a little more hair than other types of rats in the environment, the roof rat`s nose is more blunt and short compared to the sewer rat house rat house body size is not too big and not too small, usually house mice have a body size ranging from 2 cm to 10 cm, the size and length of the tail is longer than the sewer rat
